page.title: 08GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: One of the games children play at Misson School is :-Catch, Catch is when you have so many people standing in a circle or a square and the person who has the ball throws it to the next person standing by them ,then that person throws it to the next and it carries on around the circle or square. If you drop the ball you stand on one leg but if you catch it again you can stand on two feet again. Tig is a game we play as well. Tig is when somebody is on and they try to touch a person when they are on. Tiggy Scarecrow is something similar to Tig. Someone is on and they try to touch a person then that person stands in that spot and she stands with her legs open and her asrms spread out and another person has to go under the arms and that other person is set free. If you are tug three times you are on.
